Package sru.edu.group1.workorders.controller

Class TechController

java.lang.Object
sru.edu.group1.workorders.controller.TechController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/tech") public class TechController extends Object
This is the controllers for the "worker" role of the project; Technicians. They can be assigned too, or take on any open work order, they are also able to update and close incidents they are assigned too.
Author:
Trevor Bell trevorbell030@gmail.com, Ellie Wurst, John Friend, Hunter Minteer

  • Method Details

    • viewTechPage

      @GetMapping("/Landing") public String viewTechPage(@CurrentSecurityContext(expression="authentication?.name") String username, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The tech landing page, where they can see their profile, see a list of incidents, and a number of other options
      Parameters:
      username - Holds the name of the person logged in to display in the corner
      model - holds information to send to the HTML pages, such as the username
      Returns:
      the tech landing page

    • asignedIncidents

      @GetMapping("/techIncidents") public String asignedIncidents(@CurrentSecurityContext(expression="authentication?.name") String username, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      A list of all incidents in the DB, for the tech to look at, there are options such as self-assigning avaliable to the techs as well
      Parameters:
      username - holds a username from the logged in user
      model - holds information to pass to the HTML page
      Returns:
      a list of all the incidents with certain options avaliable

    • selfAssign

      @RequestMapping("/selfAssign/{report_id}") public String selfAssign(@CurrentSecurityContext(expression="authentication?.name") String username, org.springframework.ui.Model model, @PathVariable(name="report_id") Long report_id, Users user, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      When a tech assigns themself to an incident, it will attache their email to the incident, as well as resaving the incident in question
      Parameters:
      username - holds username to apply the tech email to the incident
      model - holds the username to give to the HTML page to display it
      report_id - holds the incidents ID that is in question
      user - will hold the information about the logged in user
      request - holds information for use with HTTP services, such as sending an email
      Returns:
      the tech back to the incident list, and will move the incident to the top of the page
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - holds error for encoding methods
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - holds errors for messaging methods

    • closeIncident

      @RequestMapping("/closeIncident/{report_id}") public String closeIncident(@PathVariable(name="report_id") Long report_id, org.springframework.ui.Model incident, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      once assigned, a technician will then gain the option to close an incident, or list that they it has been completed After that the user who submitted the incident will get an email saying it has been completed
      Parameters:
      report_id - holds the id of the report in quetion
      incident - holds all incident information
      request - holds information for HTTP requests such as sending an email
      Returns:
      the tech will return to the incident page, with the incident now marked as closed
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - holds error infromation for encoding methods
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - holds error information for basic messaging methods

    • updateIncident

      @GetMapping("/updateIncident/{report_id}") public String updateIncident(@PathVariable(name="report_id") Long report_id, String update, String incident, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Brings up a form for the tech to update the user
      Parameters:
      report_id - holds the report's id that is being updated
      update - holds the email contents sent by the tech
      incident - holds the information related to the specific incident
      model - passes the update and incident values into the html
      Returns:
      returns the update incident form

    • processUpdateIncident

      @PostMapping("/processUpdateIncident/{report_id}") public String processUpdateIncident(@PathVariable(name="report_id") Long report_id, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, org.springframework.ui.Model incident) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Takes the data from the update incident form and sends a email to update the user on the incident
      Parameters:
      report_id - holds the report's id that is being updated
      request - holds information for HTTP requests such as sending an email
      incident - holds the incidents information
      Returns:
      returns the tech to the tech landing page
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - holds error infromation for encoding methods
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - holds error information for basic messaging methods

    • activeIncident

      @RequestMapping("/activeIncident/{report_id}") public String activeIncident(@PathVariable(name="report_id") Long report_id, org.springframework.ui.Model incident, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request) throws UnsupportedEncodingException, jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      once assigned, a technician will then gain the option to mark an incident as active After that the user who submitted the incident will get an email saying it is being worked on
      Parameters:
      report_id - holds the id of the report that was selected
      incident - holds all incident information
      request - holds information for HTTP requests such as sending an email
      Returns:
      the tech will return to the incident page, with the incident now marked as active
      Throws:
      UnsupportedEncodingException - holds error information for encoding methods
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException - holds error information for basic messaging methods
